sentences.english: The rock fragments selected shall be real and representative; interference by fake rock fragments shall be eliminated.
sentences.chinese: 挑取的岩屑要真實具有代表性，排除假岩屑的干擾。

sentences.english: The rock fragments selected shall be real and representative; interference by fake rock fragments shall be eliminated.
sentences.chinese: 挑取的岩屑要真實具有代表性，排除假岩屑的干擾。

sentences.english: The effect of contaminants and falling cuttings is to be eliminated in description.
sentences.chinese: 岩屑描述時，必須避免掉塊和污染物的影響。

sentences.english: The diagenetic compaction and plastic rock debris greatly influence its reservoir property.
sentences.chinese: 儲集性主要受成巖壓實和塑性岩屑影響。

sentences.english: The churning debris reached a relatively straight-wall segment of the channel.
sentences.chinese: 翻騰的岩屑到達相對順直的河道壁的地段。

sentences.english: There are so many return cuttings on the shale shaker.
sentences.chinese: 震動篩有很多返出的岩屑。

sentences.english: Detrital component of reservoirs are main lithic fragment and quartz without feldspar.
sentences.chinese: 儲層碎屑成分以岩屑和石英爲主，幾乎不含長石。

definition: variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
waste rock (mining)/gangue (worthless minerals mixed in with coal or ore)
